Detailed Description

Thread used to save the cluster file.

The thread calls the Data object which will do the work.

Author:
Lynn Hazan

Member Function Documentation

void SaveThread::save ( const KURL &  url,
KlustersDoc *  doc,
bool  isSaveAs = false 
)

Begins the execution of the thread which will save the cluster information.

Parameters:
url the url where to store the cluster information
doc document corresponding to the data, contains the algorithm to actually save the cluster information
isSaveAs true if the current save action is a saveAs action (meaning the file to save is different from the one used to load the data), false otherwise. The default is false.
